sourcesContent: import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, FormGroup, Label, Input, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' const InputFloating = () => { return ( Floating Label Inputs For Floting Label Inputs,you'll have to use .form-label-group class as a wrapper & add attribute disabled for disabled Floating Label Input. {' '} ) } export default InputFloating
